Package me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.types

Interface IFilterType<T,TData>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of data being filtered.
TData - The typed value of the filter.
All Known Implementing Classes:
BigDecimalFilterType, BigIntegerFilterType, BooleanFilterType, ByteFilterType, CalendarFilterType, DateFilterType, DoubleFilterType, EnumFilterType, FilterTypeBase, FloatFilterType, InstantFilterType, IntegerFilterType, LocalDateFilterType, LocalDateTimeFilterType, LocalTimeFilterType, LongFilterType, OffsetDateTimeFilterType, OffsetTimeFilterType, ShortFilterType, SqlDateFilterType, SqlTimeFilterType, SqlTimestampFilterType, TextFilterType, UuidFilterType, ZonedDateTimeFilterType
public interface IFilterType<T,TData>
Represents an interface for filter types.

  • Method Details

    • getTargetType

      Class<TData> getTargetType()
      Returns the target type of the filter.
      Returns:
      The target type of the filter.

    • getValidType

      GridFilterType getValidType(GridFilterType type)
      Returns a valid GridFilterType based on the input type.
      Parameters:
      type - The GridFilterType to check.
      Returns:
      The valid GridFilterType. If the input type is not a valid type, returns GridFilterType.EQUALS.

    • getTypedValue

      TData getTypedValue(String value)
      Retrieves the typed value of a given string value based on the targetType. The targetType should be set in the constructor of the implementing class.
      Parameters:
      value - The string value to convert to a typed value.
      Returns:
      The typed value corresponding to the given string value. Returns null if the string value cannot be converted to the targetType.

    • getFilterExpression

      jakarta.persistence.criteria.Predicate getFilterExpression(jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder cb, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<T> cq, jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> root, org.hibernate.query.sqm.tree.select.SqmQuerySpec source, String expression, String value, GridFilterType filterType)
      Filters the data based on a given expression and value using the specified filter type.
      Parameters:
      cb - The criteria builder used for constructing queries.
      cq - The criteria query being constructed.
      root - The root entity being queried.
      source - The query specification for the current query.
      expression - The expression to filter on.
      value - The value to filter against.
      filterType - The filter type to apply.
      Returns:
      A predicate representing the filter expression.

    • getFilterExpression

      jakarta.persistence.criteria.Predicate getFilterExpression(jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder cb, jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<T> cq, jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> root, org.hibernate.query.sqm.tree.select.SqmQuerySpec source, String expression, String value, GridFilterType filterType, String removeDiacritics)
      Retrieves the filter expression predicate based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      cb - The CriteriaBuilder object.
      cq - The CriteriaQuery object.
      root - The Root object.
      source - The SqmQuerySpec object.
      expression - The filter expression.
      value - The filter value.
      filterType - The GridFilterType.
      removeDiacritics - Whether to remove diacritics from the filter value.
      Returns:
      The Predicate representing the filter expression.
